features.name: total_score
features.definition: Aggregated raw score for a user-skill pair before normalization.

features.name: score_0_100
features.definition: Normalized skill score on a 0-100 scale.

features.name: confidence
features.definition: Confidence in the score, based on volume and variety of evidence.

features.name: engagement_quality
features.definition: Metric combining engagement and difficulty (engagement * difficulty). Indicates quality of interaction.

features.name: depth_rate
features.definition: Ratio of pages with strong or weak depth keywords.

features.name: revisit_index
features.definition: Log-transformed average visit count to pages for a skill.

features.name: difficulty_exposure
features.definition: Average difficulty of pages viewed for a skill.

features.name: diversity
features.definition: Shannon entropy of domains visited for a skill.
